attributes.additional_details: Pledge for Comprehensive National Survey, which should be MANDATORY; to assess the affordability of place of residence (village/ towns/ cities) in comparison to the wage of the individual / family. The income and affordability survey should be based upon age, profession, size of family, taxes, necessary expenditures, such as, childcare, food, fuel, transport, etc.

rejection.details: This is a duplicate of a petition that was declined.
